---
title: "Requirements"
---

For this course you will need the following setup:

- **Python**: Anaconda, Anaconda Environment `dst` and Visual Studio Code
- **GitHub**: Create a GitHub Organization for your team and use GitHub Projects

:::{.callout-important}
Visit the "[Programming Toolkit-webpage](https://kirenz.github.io/lab-toolkit/)" to learn how to meet all requirements.
:::
